title: Speakman steps down as Travel Counsellors chairman
text:
Speakman steps down as Travel Counsellors chairman 14 July 2015 Save 
David Speakman has formally stepped down as chairman at Travel Counsellors. 
The founder of the homeworking agency has retained the stake in the company he has had since the MBO. 
The management team remains the same under the continued leadership of managing director Steve Byrne. 
Speakman said: “Since Maureen and I created Travel Counsellors over 20 years ago, it has been a fantastic journey of emotional fulfilment. 
“I now think it appropriate to take a back seat in the business in my capacity as chairman, whilst still maintaining the same level of investment in the company. 
“I wish everyone, the directors, staff and the whole family of Travel Counsellors continued success and happiness and I know the special company we have built together will continue to grow and change people’s lives for the better for many years to come.” Readers' comments (1) John McEwan | Tue, 14 Jul 2015 11:59 am 
Congratulations David on building an innovative business and creating a market leading company with its own special culture.
